actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of impact aid to certain school districts.

summary.text: Entitles a local educational agency to receive impact aid payments when: (1) the population of the school district is below 22,000; and (2) the United States owns Federal property aggregating 40 percent or more of the total assessed value of the district's real property.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of impact aid to certain school districts.
